text: Enhanced other networks (EON) is a radio system used to deliver traffic information to enabled devices. It is a component of the European Radio Data System (RDS). The system delivers traffic information (TP and TA) to enabled devices, by interrupting the current stream of media (radio, cd, etc.) and sends the traffic message. ==References== ==External links== * A Guide to the Radio Data System Category:Broadcast engineering Category:Radio technology
title: Enhanced other networks
